segments.text: Hi , Mary . You look pale today . What's the matter with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I've caught a cold . Now I'm aching all over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better take some medicine and have a good rest . I hope you'll be yourself pretty soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I suppose I should go to see a doctor .
segments.speaker: S2
